NG0553:1: @#// rgya gar skad du ar+ya many+dzu shri rat+na gu h+ya tan tra /
NG0553:3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud /
NG0553:4: bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0553:5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
NG0553:6: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas /
NG0553:8: rgya yongs su ma chad pa dur khrod chen po
NG0553:9: rab tu 'jigs pa gtum pa'i tshal bam ro brtsegs
NG0553:10: pa'i pho brang mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dbyings
NG0553:11: na // bcom ldan 'das dpal khro mchog ya man
NG0553:12: ta ka za byed kyi yum chen mo pe ta
NG0553:14: gnyis su med pa mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las /
NG0553:15: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bcud bsdus nas /
NG0553:16: g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0553:18: nyid las ma g.yos pa'i sprul pa rdo rje 'jigs byed dang */
NG0553:19: dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang */
NG0553:20: sa dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang */
NG0553:21: gdug pa 'dul byed khro rgyal dregs pa can rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te //
NG0553:22: 'di ltar ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang */
NG0553:24: thar byed chen po brgyad dang */
NG0553:25: khram bdag chen po bcu gnyis dang */
NG0553:26: shan pa chen po brgyad dang */
NG0553:27: mdangs len gyi khro mo brgyad dang */
NG0553:34: zor thogs kyi ma mo dang sha za'i srin po dang */
NG0553:35: srin mo la sogs pa dregs pa can thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
NG0553:36: de yi tshe 'khor de dag gi nang nas thugs kyi sprul pa 'jigs byed chen po bzhengs te /
NG0553:37: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0553:38: ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa yis //
NG0553:39: mi rtog mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang */
NG0553:40: gdug pa 'dul phyir rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs la //
NG0553:41: thugs rje drag pos 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig / ces gsol pas /
NG0553:43: mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las /
NG0553:44: rol pa chen po gtum pa'i sku /
NG0553:45: dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon bar bzhengs te /
NG0553:46: gdug pa gdul bar byed pa dpa' brtul 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0553:47: de yi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur /
NG0553:48: rab tu 'gul zhing ldeg go / 'khor du gtogs shing 'dus pa rnams 'gyel te /
NG0553:49: rab tu gan te 'gyel bar gyur to //
NG0553:50: de nas thugs kyi sprul pa ya ma ra dzas gsol pa //
NG0553:51: kye ma sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang *//
NG0553:52: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'jigs pa'i sku khros pa'i //
NG0553:53: dpa' brtul 'bar byed brtan pa ngo mtshar che //
NG0553:54: 'jig rten khams kun 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos //
NG0553:55: 'khor du gtogs pa rab tu brgyal te 'gyel //
NG0553:56: 'khor rnams so so srog dang ldan par mdzod //
NG0553:58: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:59: chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya
NG0553:60: ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la snyoms par zhugs
NG0553:61: so // de ma thag tu 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs te /
NG0553:62: bcom ldan 'das la srog gi snying po dril te phul to //
NG0553:63: kye ho 'phags pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed //
NG0553:64: rab tu khros pas sems can dran pa nyams //
NG0553:65: rdzun 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar che //
NG0553:66: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
NG0553:67: rnam shes srog snying dril ba'i mchog / bstan pa bsrung phyir mdongs gsol phul //
NG0553:68: dkyil 'khor chen po'i bsrungs ma bgyid //
NG0553:69: e ya ma me ta k+she /
NG0553:73: zhes pa mdongs gsol du phul lo //
NG0553:74: de nas yang thugs kyi sprul pa ya ma ra dzas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0553:75: kye ma 'jigs byed chen po lags //
NG0553:76: gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i nga ro yis //
NG0553:77: 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang bsdus nas //
NG0553:78: 'jam dbyangs khro bor zhugs pa nyid //
NG0553:79: gshed bdag dpa' bo sgrub pa dang *//
NG0553:80: 'khor gyi shan pa bkol ba yi //
NG0553:81: las kyi rim pa bshad par mdzod //
NG0553:83: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su
NG0553:84: bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas 'di skad
NG0553:86: mi rtog mnyam pa chen po las /
NG0553:87: bstan pa'i snying po nges par bshad //
NG0553:88: byin brlabs ldan pa gsang ba'i bcud //
NG0553:89: rnal 'byor chen po rtsa ba'i don //
NG0553:90: bstan pa rin chen rgya lam gcig / thabs dang shes rab snying po'i bka' //
NG0553:91: nye bar gyur pa gsang ba'i don //
NG0553:92: dngos grub chen po nye ba'i mchog / lus gcig yan lag bzhi dang ldan //
NG0553:93: mtha' sdud kha gso las kyis so //
NG0553:94: rnal dang lto dkrug bzlog pa yi //
NG0553:95: bsnyen bsgrub spogs dang shi sa 'gro //
NG0553:96: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis //
NG0553:97: las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer dkrug / yan lag nye ba shan pa'i so //
NG0553:98: gsang sngags don gyi snying po 'di //
NG0553:99: rigs ldan nye ba'i sras kyi zung *//
NG0553:100: bgrod pa gsum gyis bcud blangs te //
NG0553:101: yun du mi gtong rnal 'byor can //
NG0553:102: nyid kyi lta spyod gsang ba ste //
NG0553:103: bka' byin rlabs yun du bde //
NG0553:104: thabs kyis 'gro ba'i lam du yang *//
NG0553:105: smod pa'i rgyal po lam gyi mchog / zhe sdang gtum khro'i ngang tshul can //
NG0553:106: nye bar gyur pa'i lam du bshad //
NG0553:107: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:108: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o //    // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:109: khro bo 'byung ba zhes bya ba nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:110: rtog med spros bral chos kyi dbyings //
NG0553:111: dmigs med mkha' mnyam byang chub sems //
NG0553:112: dngos dang mtshan mar mi dmigs pas //
NG0553:113: chos nyid ngang du dbyer med mnyam //
NG0553:114: chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du //
NG0553:115: sgyu ma'i sems nyid de dang 'dra //
NG0553:116: mkha' la gzha' tshon snang ba yang *//
NG0553:117: nam mkha' ngang du ro gcig mnyam //
NG0553:118: yod de yod pa ma yin te //
NG0553:119: gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das //
NG0553:120: med de med pa ma yin te //
NG0553:122: sems nyid 'od kyi thig le las //
NG0553:124: hu~m las 'khor lo b+h+rum gyi sgras //
NG0553:125: rnam par dag pa yum gyi klong *//
NG0553:126: skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid las //
NG0553:127: thugs kyi byin rlabs chen po yis //
NG0553:128: ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang *//
NG0553:129: phyi nang med par kun tu nang *//
NG0553:130: gsar snying thod chen 'bar bas gtams //
NG0553:131: gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan //
NG0553:132: sgo bzhi gru chad bar khyams ldan //
NG0553:133: rta babs bzhi ngang rta ra na //
NG0553:134: dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang sbrul //
NG0553:135: lha brgyad klu brgyad ka ba gdung *//
NG0553:136: nyi zla rin chen gdan dang bro //
NG0553:137: gza' brgyad rgyu skar ldan pas klubs //
NG0553:138: rus sbal sbrul nag khyung gis mdzes //
NG0553:139: ban d+ha lcang lo kha bad can //
NG0553:140: ta la'i shing dang ro myags 'dam //
NG0553:141: dur khrod po'i gnas brgyad ldan //
NG0553:142: bde gshegs kun gyi rang bzhin gyi //
NG0553:143: yi ge hu~m gi byin rlabs las //
NG0553:144: lhun grub gzhal yas gsal ba'i dbus //
NG0553:145: ma mo gshin rje ded dpon gyis //
NG0553:146: dam tshig dran de gdan du bsnol //
NG0553:147: yi dwags ma he'i khri stengs na //
NG0553:148: gyad kyi 'jigs tshul brjid par gnas //
NG0553:150: kyi yi ge bcu bdun pos //
NG0553:151: nga yi gzugs su gyur par byos //
NG0553:152: ro langs khro ma mthing skya'i sku //
NG0553:153: tri shul ban dmar phyag na bsnams //
NG0553:154: skyem mo'i khro mo smug gcig ste //
NG0553:155: mi snying spyang mor 'dzin pa gnas //
NG0553:156: ye shes thugs kyi sa bon las //
NG0553:157: smugs nag khros pa'i gshin rje ste //
NG0553:158: 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza dang *//
NG0553:159: nag mo khrag gi mig can ma //
NG0553:160: mngag pa las kyi pho nyar bsam //
NG0553:161: thod khang gshin rje bdud dang ni //
NG0553:162: srin po gnod sbyin khro bo la //
NG0553:163: lcags mkhar khram bdag bcu gnyis ldan //
NG0553:164: dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas brgyad nas //
NG0553:165: brda dang gar bsgyur rdo rje gdang *//
NG0553:166: sprugs pa'i glu len dung 'bud dang *//
NG0553:167: sha za khrag skyems rkan brdabs dang *//
NG0553:168: khro dang rgod dang dar nag g.yab 'dor dang *//
NG0553:169: dur khrod ro la 'thub zhing za ba dang *//
NG0553:172: 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'don rngam pa'i sgra chen sgrogs //
NG0553:173: lce spyang ling du kang ka mchu rings sogs //
NG0553:174: dpag med dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan //
NG0553:175: dkyil 'khor bsam 'das rtog med rdzogs pa chen //
NG0553:176: mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje chen po yis //
NG0553:177: 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku //
NG0553:178: dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs shing rngam par bgrad //
NG0553:179: rtag chad 'dzin rtog mtha' las 'das pa'i sku //
NG0553:180: phyag rgya chen po sgrol ba'i lam du gsungs //
NG0553:181: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:182: sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o //  // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:183: drag po'i tshim rngam 'bar bas gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir /
NG0553:184: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi gsung gi
NG0553:185: de kho na nyid gsang sngags kyi yi ge 'di
NG0553:186: dag gsungs so // bsnyen dang nye ba rgyun gyi sngags //
NG0553:187: drag po'i mtshon cha rno myur ldan //
NG0553:188: lha srin srog gi rtsa ba 'di //
NG0553:190: mi yur mi 'khyams bsam gtan gyis //
NG0553:191: lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te //
NG0553:192: ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
NG0553:193: gshin rje'i sku la blta zhing bsgom //
NG0553:194: myur ba ma yin bul ba min //
NG0553:195: de bzhin yi ge 'dres pa min //
NG0553:196: shin tu gsal zhing dag par smra //
NG0553:197: yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba ste //
NG0553:198: rnam pa yi ge ngo bo lha //
NG0553:199: rang bzhin stong pa nus pa me //
NG0553:200: ya man ta ka'i ngo bo nyid //
NG0553:201: om a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hu~m phat /
NG0553:203: 'chi bdag gshin rje bshan rje bshan pa'i tshogs //
NG0553:204: rdo rje khrau mo khrag mig ma //
NG0553:205: nag mo ral pa 'bebs pa'i tshogs //
NG0553:206: bsnyen cing bsgrubs na gang yang 'grub //
NG0553:207: om sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra /
NG0553:208: sa man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hu~mdza /
NG0553:209: om sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya man ta ka ya ma ra dza /
NG0553:210: ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza /
NG0553:211: traka ragi sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo /
NG0553:212: rag mo te kum dza dza /
NG0553:215: ya ma lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dza /
NG0553:216: snying khar rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0553:217: 'chi bdag gshin rje'i smod pa ste //
NG0553:218: mtshon cha'i ya gi dug gi ngar //
NG0553:219: ye shes lha dang las byed dang *//
NG0553:220: srog gi rtsa ba'i 'di lta bu //
NG0553:221: om ya man ta ka ya ma ra dza sa ho me ya /
NG0553:222: ya me to ru na yo to ya /
NG0553:223: ya ta yo na ra yak+she ya /
NG0553:224: yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:225: om om ya ma ra dza sa to me b+h+yo /
NG0553:226: ru lu ru lu che ge mo hu~m phat /
NG0553:227: bam ri li li rbad nan /
NG0553:229: che ge mo tshal pa tshal ba nan /
NG0553:230: om snying gshogs snying me kha la mu lo tsa thun nan /
NG0553:231: om sa ti ru ru gong bkra ra tsa nan /
NG0553:232: che ge mo ma ra ya nan /
NG0553:233: om a kro te ka many+dzu shri kak+sho la ru pa sha ya nan /
NG0553:234: bam rbad ru lu ru hu~m dza /
NG0553:236: sta sha ru ni nan che ge mo ma ra ya nan /
NG0553:237: om ya man ta kem ar+ya a tsa la k+sham / om ma dug tsa tsa /
NG0553:238: tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad /
NG0553:241: che ge mo srog rtsa mugs ti rbad /
NG0553:243: ma mo khrag la gshin rje khram /
NG0553:245: srin po rus la chom chom tshal /
NG0553:247: dgra bo khram ka khram ri li li ni dza rbad /
NG0553:250: che ge mo la cho cho /
NG0553:256: khrag thun khong khreg la ya /
NG0553:257: raka mo shen pa ma ra ya /
NG0553:259: dug mun bla rtsa la dza dza /
NG0553:260: rtsa bo che la dun rmugs nang khrol smad la lnga rtsa ba thun bam /
NG0553:261: thums ri li li rbad rbad /
NG0553:262: gsang ba'i kha thun brnag pa'i so //
NG0553:263: khrag dang phur ba nyungs kar sngags //
NG0553:265: sngags kyi grong khyer sgrel byas pa //
NG0553:266: spyi rgyugs dus mtha' brtul bar byed //
NG0553:267: gsang sngags drag po thun gyis so //
NG0553:269: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:270: gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o //    // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:271: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:273: gtum chen dregs pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha //
NG0553:274: dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
NG0553:275: khro rngam gdug par srid gsum thal bar rlog / sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol //
NG0553:276: gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha //
NG0553:277: 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0553:278: nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od stong phyogs bcur 'gyed //
NG0553:279: gdug byed mtshon cha mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar //
NG0553:280: rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0553:281: rdo rje'i sku la sku dbang rab brgyan cing *//
NG0553:282: gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon na bzar gsol //
NG0553:283: sha za 'ug pa'i tshom bus dbu yi thod du bcings //
NG0553:284: khro bo'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug hu~m sgra can //
NG0553:285: phat kyis khams gsum stong mdzad zhabs drug gshin rje @#//
NG0553:287: brkyang bskum brjid pas gshin rje ya ba ti'i snying kha gnan /
NG0553:288: ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog phab bas //
NG0553:289: 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang bran du 'khol //
NG0553:290: tsham rngam khro bo'i rkan sgra brdabs pa yis //
NG0553:291: 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang 'dar cug bcug / tshangs pa 'khor bcas rdul gyi thigs 'dzag cing *//
NG0553:292: lha chen khyab 'jug maha de ba gnon //
NG0553:293: phyag na ban d+ha rlon pa rab bsnams shing *//
NG0553:294: dngos grub 'khrug cing klad khrag zhal du gsol //
NG0553:295: khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khrag bsnams shing *//
NG0553:296: dam las ldog pa rnams la gtong par mdzod /
NG0553:297: e ka dza ti gu ya ral gcig ma //
NG0553:298: mi pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral gcig ma //
NG0553:299: ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb re re nas //
NG0553:300: khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug stong khams khengs par 'gyed //
NG0553:301: kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs byed lcags kyu can //
NG0553:302: lcags kyu btab pas dgra bo'i rtsa ba gcod //
NG0553:303: gtum khro 'jigs byed yab yum tshogs la bstod //
NG0553:305: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag la /
NG0553:306: mchod pa 'bul ba 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:307: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NG0553:308: mthing nag kham pa ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba'i lha //
NG0553:309: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba yis //
NG0553:310: sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kun kyang 'dar spyug
NG0553:311: spyug / spyan dgu sdang mig gyen du bzlog pa
NG0553:312: yis // phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun yang gan bub bsre //
NG0553:313: smin ma glog stong 'od du 'bar ba yis //
NG0553:314: sprul pa'i pho nyas srid gsum gang bar 'gongs //
NG0553:315: mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsigs pa yis //
NG0553:316: dam nyams dgra bo'i srog rtsa gtsod par mdzad //
NG0553:317: zhal nas khro bo'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pa yis //
NG0553:318: khams gsum srid gsum 'gul zhing ldeg / phyag drug mtshon cha mang pos dgra bgegs thal bar lhogs //
NG0553:319: thugs dam bskul gyis gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NG0553:320: 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam dgyes bskul ma //
NG0553:321: e ka dza ti 'jigs byed dpal gyi yum //
NG0553:322: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NG0553:323: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma gcig rdo rje lha mo dam tshig ma //
NG0553:324: sku stod g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan //
NG0553:325: sku smad stag lpags rlon pa 'bum gyi cha ga can //
NG0553:326: g.yu yi ral pas dur khrod khams kun khyab //
NG0553:327: 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol //
NG0553:328: sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bsnams su gsol //
NG0553:329: bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang *//
NG0553:331: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:332: pho brang dkyil 'khor chen po la bstod pa dang
NG0553:333: mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o // // de nas
NG0553:335: las kyi ru tra bsgral ba'i phyir /
NG0553:336: 'phrin las kyi rgyal po yi dgas 'khor lo nag @#//
NG0553:337: po gsad pa las kyi spu gri 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:338: thog mar shes bya blo sbyangs shing *//
NG0553:339: dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis //
NG0553:340: lta spyod gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis //
NG0553:341: dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i //
NG0553:342: gsar rnying mi ro spungs pa 'am //
NG0553:343: lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i //
NG0553:344: brag ri nag po ha la'i mdog / 'chi bdag pho mo sgrub pa'i gnas //
NG0553:345: sngon du bsod nams rdzogs pa yis //
NG0553:346: dur khrod sa la man+dal bya //
NG0553:347: rme ba'i khrag gis rab byugs la //
NG0553:348: byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas //
NG0553:349: mi smra mi yur mi 'khyam par //
NG0553:350: bzlas pa'i yi ge bcu bdun no //
NG0553:351: bye ba sngon du rdzogs par bya //
NG0553:352: khyad par gshin rje bsgrub pa'i dus //
NG0553:353: snang srid rak+ta'i gzhal yas su //
NG0553:354: dpal dang ya ma'i gtor ma dang *//
NG0553:355: gshin rje pho mo'i dam rdzas bsham //
NG0553:356: snang sring ma mo 'du ba'i phyir //
NG0553:358: sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis //
NG0553:359: lha yi ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rten //
NG0553:360: bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram //
NG0553:361: ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pas bsgom //
NG0553:362: ya man ta ka 'khor bcas bsgom //
NG0553:363: dbyings nas spyan drangs mchod pa dbul //
NG0553:364: de nas drag po'i sbyor ba ni //
NG0553:365: drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus //
NG0553:366: dur khrod ras la sngags bstims te //
NG0553:367: las la sbyor ka'i bsnyen pa bya //
NG0553:368: ras la dug dang sme khrag byug / srid gsum lto na yod rtags su //
NG0553:369: 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor //
NG0553:370: dbus su mu la'i yi ge ya //
NG0553:371: phyogs bzhir ma me ta k+she bri //
NG0553:372: phyi rim khang pa bcu gnyis su //
NG0553:373: me dbal yi ge bcu gnyis dgod //
NG0553:374: ya logs khang pa bcu drug la //
NG0553:375: sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa bri //
NG0553:376: nag po 'jigs pa'i lto bar gzhug / phyi rim smod pa nag po'i mtshon //
NG0553:377: sde brgyad dug gi spu gri dgod //
NG0553:378: rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor yang *//
NG0553:379: rme khrag gsum gyis rab byugs la //
NG0553:380: thig bzhi btab ba'i le'u tshe dgu //
NG0553:381: phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis //
NG0553:382: thal chen gyis ni bri bar bya //
NG0553:383: dug dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod //
NG0553:384: yi dgas ro yi gos blangs la //
NG0553:385: bla sems chags shing nyams par byed //
NG0553:386: dmigs pa'i lus ni ci 'drar bri //
NG0553:387: rnam shes gnad kyis dgug pa'i phyir //
NG0553:388: dza yi bar du yi ge nri //
NG0553:389: bod par byed pa'i ming rus bri //
NG0553:390: rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim //
NG0553:391: gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pas bdug / lha bskrad bya phyir zhabs mas bsdam //
NG0553:392: sngo dmar skud pas ske nas gdags //
NG0553:393: dur khrod khrag gi man+dal du //
NG0553:394: 'khor lo rtsang dmar kha la skyon //
NG0553:395: yi dwags gshin rje nag por bskyed //
NG0553:396: bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis //
NG0553:397: sa gzhi gshags cing rgya mtsho dkrug / las kyi gshin rje bkug la bstim //
NG0553:398: dngos ni 'chi bdag bdud chen yin //
NG0553:399: dbang du bsdus la dam rdzas sbyin /
NG0553:401: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:403: 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:404: a ma dza ra sa to me ya /
NG0553:405: che ge mo zhig a mu ka pra ma ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:406: ya me to ru na yo da ya /
NG0553:407: che ge mo zhig a mu kham mur tsa ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:408: yad yo ni ra yak+she ya che ge mo zhig a mu ka rak+ta tsa ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:409: yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo zhig a mu kam ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:410: nyin bzhig dgongs kyi kha skongs su //
NG0553:411: thun sngags nyin bzhir phyed la bzlas //
NG0553:412: spyi rgyugs sngags kyi phu sprugs kyang *//
NG0553:413: stong stong bar du dril la drang *//
NG0553:414: reg chod drag sngags dril ba yis //
NG0553:416: mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab thun du dril //
NG0553:417: gal te grub par ma gyur ram //
NG0553:418: las kyi thus ka'i dus dag tu //
NG0553:419: sngags rnams bzlog cing ar la gtad //
NG0553:420: tshogs drug gzhom zhing lnga phung gcad //
NG0553:421: dug gsum shes pa ar la gtad //
NG0553:422: 'khor lo rdzogs dang gnan sngags bzlas //
NG0553:423: tshes gcig dag tu brtsis pa yi //
NG0553:424: nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la //
NG0553:425: shis pa'i sa 'am gdon yod sar //
NG0553:426: 'khor lo mnan pa'i cho ga bya //
NG0553:427: drag po'i 'khor lo las sbyar mthar //
NG0553:428: thun gyi kha gso rgyun ma gcad //
NG0553:429: dus mtha' myur du brtul bar byed //
NG0553:431: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:432: yi dgos 'khor lo nag po'i las bsten pa'i le'u
NG0553:433: ste lnga pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NG0553:434: kyis / las myur du bya ba'i phyir /
NG0553:435: 'chi bdag thod pa nag po gsang ba'i kha thun 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:436: gdeng gsum ldan pa'i sngags pa yis //
NG0553:437: dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin la //
NG0553:438: dur khrod sa la man+dal bya //
NG0553:439: rme ba'i khrag gis rab byugs la //
NG0553:440: dbus su 'bru ba khung brtseg cing bru //
NG0553:441: kha sgyer dug shing rtsang gis bskor //
NG0553:442: gtor ma gsum dang rak+ta dang *//
NG0553:443: 'chi bdag pho mo'i dam rdzas bsag / lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la //
NG0553:444: ting 'dzin gsum po rim pa yis //
NG0553:445: gshed bdag khro bo yab yum bskyed //
NG0553:446: yang dang yang du gsal bar bsgom //
NG0553:447: 'jam dbyangs rdo rje hu~m rings kyis //
NG0553:448: sku rgyan gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NG0553:449: bstod cing gsol gdab byin rlabs kyis //
NG0553:450: gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir //
NG0553:451: drag po sngags kyi tsham rngam brjod //
NG0553:452: gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor nas //
NG0553:454: dbyings nas spyan 'dren dbyer med bstim //
NG0553:455: mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya //
NG0553:456: rgyun du gsang sngags dril la bzlas //
NG0553:457: lha rtags mngon du gyur pa'i tshe //
NG0553:458: dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya //
NG0553:459: de nas drag po'i las la 'jug / rabs chad mon dang mu su ra //
NG0553:460: thod pa nag po de blangs la //
NG0553:461: gug rgyal chu dang dri yis gsang *//
NG0553:462: ma nor thod pa gshags par bya //
NG0553:463: ltag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i bdud //
NG0553:464: 'chi bdag gdug pa seng ge mgo / zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs @#//
NG0553:466: srid pa gsum po lto na 'chang *//
NG0553:467: de yi gzugs brnyan legs brtags la //
NG0553:468: rims dang khrag tu sbyar ba yis //
NG0553:469: gshin rje'i zhal ni dbyung bar bya //
NG0553:470: dngos ni bye ba gung rings so //
NG0553:471: de yi snying khar yi ge ya //
NG0553:472: rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya //
NG0553:473: zhal nas kha thun g.yas bskor du //
NG0553:475: zhal gyi smod pa nag po yin //
NG0553:476: thod pa gong ma'i nang dag tu //
NG0553:477: ro langs lto bar mu khyud gsum //
NG0553:478: glong dgu bcu gnyis lcags khang du //
NG0553:479: drag po'i yi ge bcu bdun dgod //
NG0553:480: rag sha nag po 'jigs byed ma //
NG0553:481: dngos ni sr-in mo nag mo ste //
NG0553:482: dus mtha' brtul byed ma ru gsungs //
NG0553:483: de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar te //
NG0553:484: 'brub gnas bzhi ru ling kha bri //
NG0553:485: thod pa nag po'i rtsang la bskyon //
NG0553:486: gsang ba'i drag sngags rgyun du drang *//
NG0553:487: zla ba nag po tha chung la //
NG0553:488: drag po thun gyi 'khor lo bskor //
NG0553:489: mtshan mo thun gyis brab par bya //
NG0553:490: khram la gdab dang thun gyis gsang *//
NG0553:491: nyin mtshan sngags ni ma nor bar //
NG0553:492: bla rkun sngags kyis bla 'gugs te //
NG0553:493: spyi rgyugs sngags kyis dus mtha' brtul //
NG0553:494: 'khor lo nag po ma ra ya //
NG0553:495: gsang ba'i las su 'di shes bya //
NG0553:498: to ru na yo ni ra ya dza /
NG0553:499: dgra bo ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:504: che ge mo a mu kam ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:509: che ge mo a mu kam ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:514: che ge mo a mu kam ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:515: nyin gyi 'khor lo de ltar bskor //
NG0553:516: dug shing khram byang dag la yang *//
NG0553:517: khram sngags bris la khram la gdab //
NG0553:518: mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab khob phub la //
NG0553:519: kha thun sngags kyis brab par bya //
NG0553:520: sngags kyi brgya bar stong bar du //
NG0553:521: khrag thun dbab pa'i las kyang bya //
NG0553:522: nyung kar sngags kyis bla dgug cing *//
NG0553:523: 'chi bdag bshan pa'i dmag dpung dbab //
NG0553:524: gal te las de ma grub na //
NG0553:525: 'khor lo dkrug cing shi sa bstan //
NG0553:526: 'chi bdag ya ma ra dza dang *//
NG0553:527: bdud kyi lcam mo rtag tu rbad //
NG0553:528: spyi rgyugs sngags kyi char phab la //
NG0553:529: 'khor lo thod pa re bas dril //
NG0553:530: shis pa'i sa 'am klu gnas mnan //
NG0553:531: thun gyi kha gso rgyun du bya //
NG0553:532: de ltar byas na lha yang 'chi //
NG0553:533: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:534: thod pa nag po 'chi bdag kha thun gyi le'u
NG0553:535: ste drug pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NG0553:537: 'phrin las kyi rgyal po gshed chen po ma tram gsang ba'i las rim 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:538: lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
NG0553:539: dpa' brtul can gyi sngags pa des //
NG0553:540: dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin la //
NG0553:541: dpa' bo gri ru shi ba yis //
NG0553:542: zhing chen pags pa rab bshus la //
NG0553:546: mi rkang rgyus pa skra shad pa ri ldan pas 'khor lo bri bar bya //
NG0553:547: bcu gnyis bar du a mu kam / mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya //
NG0553:548: 'chi bdag gshin rja nag po yi //
NG0553:549: zhal phyag ldan pas shes par bya //
NG0553:550: rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug / lho yi phyogs su phyag rgya'i rten //
NG0553:551: mig gi rten du mngon par dgram //
NG0553:552: zhing lpags gzhi 'am yan lag la //
NG0553:553: smu nag ser nag dmar nag ljang *//
NG0553:554: zhing dbyug 'khor lo bsnams pa yis //
NG0553:555: gshed bdag khro bo 'jigs pa bzhi //
NG0553:556: tshon rtsi spyin med dam ldan pas //
NG0553:557: mkhas pas bris la phyogs bzhir dgram //
NG0553:558: mi rtogs dbyings nas thugs rje'i sku //
NG0553:559: bskyed de dbyings nas spyan drang mchod //
NG0553:560: gnyis su med pa'i yang snying la //
NG0553:561: mi smra rgyun gyi bsam gtan bya //
NG0553:562: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma tram nag po gsang sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:563: ya ma ra dza sa to me ya /
NG0553:564: nag po rag sha che ge mo bam ril rbad ya /
NG0553:565: ya me to ru na yo ta ya /
NG0553:566: nag po raka sha che ge mo snying bam ril rbad ya /
NG0553:567: ya ta yo ni ra yak+she ya /
NG0553:568: ar+ya che ge mo rbad ya /
NG0553:569: yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ya /
NG0553:570: raka sha che ge mo thum ril rbad ya /
NG0553:571: sngags dang 'khor lo'i bar dag tu //
NG0553:572: bod par byed pa'i ming rnams gzhug / nyin bzhi'i 'khor lo'i sngags su gsungs //
NG0553:573: mtshan mo'i srog sngags ma bzhi yis //
NG0553:574: gsang ba'i thun gyis brab par bya //
NG0553:575: re ma ti dang snying 'phrog ma //
NG0553:576: dza ti ma dang raka sha ma //
NG0553:577: gsang ba'i yang snying 'di lta ste //
NG0553:578: om ra ma ti rung trag kha rag mo snying
NG0553:579: kha rag trag ra kasha / dam nyams che ge
NG0553:581: om tsa du kha sha ka snying la rbad /
NG0553:582: tsa du ma ra ya che ge mo lce ldibs /
NG0553:583: raka sha tshal pa la pra ma ya /
NG0553:584: om dza ti ka ma ru raka sha ga ta
NG0553:585: che ge mo tram tram srin mo kha la rbad
NG0553:586: / om rag mo ru ru tsa pa la trag
NG0553:587: trag mo kro d+hi shwa ri snying la rbad ya
NG0553:588: / / gsang ba rag sha nag po ste //
NG0553:589: ma tram nag po gsad pa'i mtshon //
NG0553:590: nyungs kar gsang ba bla dgug cing *//
NG0553:591: khram la gdab dang khrag thun dbab //
NG0553:592: gshed bzhi khram bdag bskul ba dang *//
NG0553:593: spyi rgyugs las kun rdzogs par bya //
NG0553:594: dgongs dang tho rangs dus dag tu //
NG0553:595: rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma gtang *//
NG0553:596: mtshan mo'i dus su yang snying dang *//
NG0553:597: srin mo bzhi yi smod pas gdab //
NG0553:598: thun dbab srog phur sngags kyis brab //
NG0553:599: shis pa'i sa ru mkhas pas mnan //
NG0553:600: gal te las de g.yel ba na //
NG0553:601: 'khrul byed ro langs dril ba'i sngags //
NG0553:602: mtshan mo bzhi la bzlas pa bya //
NG0553:605: ya ma ra dza snying ro shan /
NG0553:606: sa tome ya krod+hi shwa ri /
NG0553:607: ya mo to ru tsit+ta ro la shan ting /
NG0553:608: na yo ta ya sa ma ya dza /
NG0553:609: ya ta yo ni ro tsa rmugs /
NG0553:610: ra yak+she ya sa ma ya dza /
NG0553:611: yak+she ya tsa snying khrag chod /
NG0553:612: ni ra ma ya srog srog ma ra ya phat /
NG0553:615: brnag ba'i rgyal po gsang ba ste //
NG0553:616: ro langs rno myur ldan pa 'di //
NG0553:617: 'jig rten mgon gyis gsang bar gdams //
NG0553:618: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:619: rag sha nag po ma tram bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ///
NG0553:620: / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen pa des //
NG0553:621: 'phrin las kyi brnag pa srog bdag g.yang gzhi la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:622: dur khrod bdag po'i gnas dag tu //
NG0553:623: bdud bcad sa la man+dal bya //
NG0553:624: ra ro khrag gis chag chag gdab //
NG0553:625: dbus su gru gsum rgya bcad de //
NG0553:626: ni rang shu dang dug gis bri //
NG0553:627: 'khrul mig bcu bdun gsang sngags dgod //
NG0553:628: zag pa zad pa'i rdzas btus la //
NG0553:629: ra khrag sbyar te shog shog la //
NG0553:630: dmigs ba ci 'dra'i ling ga bri //
NG0553:631: gnang dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod //
NG0553:632: pho nya gtang zhing bla tshe dgug / rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim //
NG0553:633: lha lnga bskrad phyir rdzas rgod sreg / sngon dmar thag pas rab btags la //
NG0553:634: lho phyogs gshin rje nyid la gdags //
NG0553:635: rog po lte dkar dmigs pa'i rten //
NG0553:636: khrag byang bcu gsum mar la gdags //
NG0553:637: ting 'dzin gsum las gshed po bskyed //
NG0553:638: mchod dang bstod pa rdzogs pa dang *//
NG0553:639: drag sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bya //
NG0553:640: srod dang tho rangs dgongs kha rnams //
NG0553:641: 'phrin las bcol ba'i las kyang bya //
NG0553:642: nyi ma ri la babs pa'i tshe //
NG0553:643: nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
NG0553:644: rdzogs dang ra bsgral g.yang gzhi bshu //
NG0553:645: dbus su e la'i yi ge ni //
NG0553:647: snying dang ling kha g.yang gzhir bshu //
NG0553:648: dmar nag drag sngags dril ba bzlas //
NG0553:649: rdzogs dang 'khor lo mnan pa bya //
NG0553:650: thun gyi kham gso shes par bya //
NG0553:651: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:652: ya ma ra dza sa to me ya /
NG0553:653: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
NG0553:654: ya ta yo ni ra yak+she ya /
NG0553:655: yak+she ya tsa ni ra ma ya /
NG0553:656: che ge mo pra ma ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:658: mu ra tsa ya ma ra ya hu~m phat /
NG0553:659: rnal ma rnal to gshod la rngam gsol la mer mer /
NG0553:663: dgra bo ma ra ya nri rbad /
NG0553:665: nyin ni so sor gtor ba ste //
NG0553:666: mtshan mo dril la ma ra ya //
NG0553:667: rnal ma rnal te'i sngags kyis gdab //
NG0553:668: bla dgug myos pa'i khrag gis bran //
NG0553:669: gshin rje nag pa'i khram la gdab //
NG0553:670: gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang *//
NG0553:671: g.yang gzhi ling ga kun dril te //
NG0553:672: lam po che 'am dur khrod khyim //
NG0553:673: stag gi kha 'am klu gnas su //
NG0553:674: mkhas pas gtad ba'i rim pa bya //
NG0553:675: rdzogs dang ra khrag dug rdzas bsre //
NG0553:676: kha thun sngags kyis kha gsos la //
NG0553:677: brnag pa'i phyogs su 'phang bar bya //
NG0553:678: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis //
NG0553:679: bkra shes tshe yi cho ga bya //
NG0553:680: las kyi rnam smin sbyang ba'i @#//
NG0553:682: bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya //
NG0553:684: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:685: srog bdag g.yang gzhi la rten te sgrub pa'i le'u
NG0553:686: ste brgyad pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NG0553:687: dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal bo yis /
NG0553:688: ro langs nag mo gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:689: las rnams kun gyis ma grub na //
NG0553:690: 'khrug byed dus mtha' brtul byed ma'i //
NG0553:691: 'khor lo thun bsdebs brnag pa'i las //
NG0553:692: las kyi thus kar ro langs bsgrub //
NG0553:693: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu //
NG0553:694: dur khrod sa la man+dal bya //
NG0553:695: khrag gis byug la dam rdzas dgod //
NG0553:696: dur khrod ro yi gos blangs la //
NG0553:697: ni rang su yis mdog bton la //
NG0553:698: sme khrag dug sbyar gnag tsha yis //
NG0553:699: gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo bris //
NG0553:700: mu khyud rim pa gsum pa yis //
NG0553:701: dngos su lcags mkhar gling dgu bya //
NG0553:702: phyi rim lcags khang bcu drug tu //
NG0553:703: tha ma re cha drug dang ldan //
NG0553:704: de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni //
NG0553:705: dbus su mu la'i yi ge ste //
NG0553:706: mtshon bya'i yi ge 'bru brgyad dgod //
NG0553:707: bcu drug mkha' 'gro rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0553:708: khang pa drug tu thun drug bri //
NG0553:709: man+dal dbus su rtsang la bskyon //
NG0553:710: rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru //
NG0553:711: snying khrag dug sbyar thun yang sbyar //
NG0553:713: mchod dang 'phrin las dag kyang bcol //
NG0553:714: nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du //
NG0553:715: nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
NG0553:716: dmod pa drag po dmo ba dang *//
NG0553:717: sngags kyi phu sprugs dag kyang bya //
NG0553:718: mtshan mo dril dang thun drug sngags //
NG0553:719: mtshon cha bsnol ma brgya phrag gdeg / khrag la gdab cing khrag thun dbab //
NG0553:720: 'khor lo thod pa re bas dril //
NG0553:721: bi ro tsan gyi khu ba 'am //
NG0553:722: klu yi pho brang yod sar mnan //
NG0553:723: gal te grub par ma gyur cing *//
NG0553:724: ro langs las la g.yel ba na //
NG0553:725: 'khor lo bzlog cing dkrug par bya //
NG0553:726: de ltar byas na lha yang 'chi //
NG0553:727: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo
NG0553:728: gsang ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di dag gsungs so
NG0553:729: // om sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya ma ra dza /
NG0553:730: ma ma e ka ti dza dza /
NG0553:731: traka rag sha ma tra sting kha rag ma b+h+yo /
NG0553:733: nyi ya ya lon tsin dan ma ma b+h+yo /
NG0553:734: snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0553:735: ya dum sham dun man tsit+ta rak+ta /
NG0553:738: che ge mo a mu ka / srog la thum shag ma ra ya rbad /
NG0553:739: nyin mtshan sngags ni dril gtor sdeb //
NG0553:740: ma ma tsit+ta kha la rak+sha dun b+h+yo /
NG0553:741: ma ma dum bu dum bu tshal pa tshal pa /
NG0553:742: ha na ha na thun b+h+yo /
NG0553:743: ma ma hur yam ling rbad thun b+h+yo /
NG0553:744: ma ma brag brag ni mi ni li thun b+h+yo /
NG0553:745: ma ma thum thum rub rub /
NG0553:747: ma ma kha la rak+mo tsa la breng shag thun b+h+yo /
NG0553:752: a mu ka srog thum shag ma ra ya rbad /
NG0553:754: ma me te ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad /
NG0553:755: ro langs las la g.yel ba na //
NG0553:756: bzlog cing dkrug ba'i gsang sngags te //
NG0553:757: ya ba sha yi las su gsungs //
NG0553:758: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:759: ro langs gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o // //
NG0553:760: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi
NG0553:761: rgyal pos srog tig phur zor nag po zhes bya
NG0553:762: ba / mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i las 'di gsungs so //
NG0553:763: gsung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
NG0553:764: man+dal legs par bshams nas kyang *//
NG0553:765: pho brang gsang ba'i zhal phyung la //
NG0553:766: drag po'i zor kyang rdzogs par bya //
NG0553:767: mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i dam rdzas bsag / sngags pa chas gos nag po gon //
NG0553:768: ya man+ta kar gsal byas la //
NG0553:769: gnyis su med pa'i yang snying bzlas //
NG0553:770: phur gdab zor 'phang mnan pa bya //
NG0553:771: spyug pa'i glu blang ma mo bod //
NG0553:772: rdza rnga brdung ste gshin rje rbad //
NG0553:774: bla rtags lon dang phur bus gdab //
NG0553:775: grub rtags byung nas zor yang 'phang *//
NG0553:776: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las /
NG0553:777: gnyis su med pa'i yang snying khyad par du bzlas pa 'di dag gsungs so //
NG0553:778: om sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya man+ta ka ya ma ra dza /
NG0553:779: ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza /
NG0553:781: kha la ma hi b+ho b+h+yo /
NG0553:782: snying kha rag che ge mo srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0553:783: nag mo bam ri li li /
NG0553:784: nag mo khrag la ri li li /
NG0553:785: nag mo snying la ri li li /
NG0553:786: nag mo srog la ri li li /
NG0553:787: nag mo srog la cho cho /
NG0553:788: nag mo bam ri li li /
NG0553:789: dza dza re ma ti pa sha tsa pa la dza dza /
NG0553:790: nag mo dgra bo'i snying la thum ril rbad /
NG0553:791: nag mo dgra bo'i rtsa la bam ril rbad /
NG0553:792: nag mo dgra bo'i srog la hur thums rbad /
NG0553:793: nag mo dgra bo'i khrag la thum ril rbad /
NG0553:794: pa tsa pa tsa ma ra ya thum ril rbad /
NG0553:795: nag mo snying la thum ril rbad /
NG0553:796: nag mo srog la bam ril rbad /
NG0553:797: nag mo sha la stam pa ril rbad /
NG0553:798: nag mo rtsa la khug ril rbad /
NG0553:799: nag mo dbugs la hur thums ma ra ya rbad /
NG0553:800: srog phur gsang ba'i yang snying ste //
NG0553:801: gsang ba'i brnag par yang dag bshad //
NG0553:802: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:803: mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o //    // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NG0553:804: yogs su bskor ba'i 'khor rnams la gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gtad do //
NG0553:806: e ma yang gsang rnal 'byor che //
NG0553:807: dbyings dang ye shes rol ba'i don //
NG0553:808: nye bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rgyud //
NG0553:809: 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i lung *//
NG0553:810: brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i bcud //
NG0553:811: gnas dang srid pa sprul pa gcod //
NG0553:813: sems las sems byung chos kyi sku //
NG0553:814: gsum gnyis lnga dang gnyis su yang *//
NG0553:815: gnyis med gnyis su med par rdzogs //
NG0553:817: gom pa bgrod pas 'gro drug gnas //
NG0553:820: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog / gcod pa'i 'phrin las dngos nyid de //
NG0553:821: stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad //
NG0553:822: ye shes sgrol ba'i rtags kyis sgrol //
NG0553:824: gnang dgu gzer chen rgyu dang ni //
NG0553:825: bcu gnyis tshul dang 'gros lugs brgyad //
NG0553:826: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang *//
NG0553:827: 'od zer brgyad kyis yang dag rdzogs //
NG0553:828: de dag dngos grub nye ba'i mthar //
NG0553:829: dus nyid rang 'byung rtsol ba la //
NG0553:830: bskul ba rnam bzhi sbyor ba gsum //
NG0553:831: bgrod stobs phyag rgya ldan pas brtsam //
NG0553:835: rgyu rkyen dgra las bca' ba'i thabs //
NG0553:836: yul la phyin nang gsang ba gsum //
NG0553:837: dbang po dod pa'i ngo bo lus //
NG0553:838: rgyu bcas sgra las lnga yi mtshon //
NG0553:839: de bzhin gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NG0553:840: ngo bo sgra dang drang dang dkrug / las dang gdags pa mtha' ru sbyar //
NG0553:841: phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad //
NG0553:842: de ltar bu rgya gsum dang ldan //
NG0553:843: sgra dang ngo bo gnas dang las //
NG0553:844: rgyu ba'i tshul des nyi ma bshad //
NG0553:845: gshin rje gsum lus thugs kyi bdag / rang gi ngo bo rgyud dang sgra //
NG0553:846: gnas dang las de gsod pa'i tshul //
NG0553:847: de yis gshin rje'i grong khyer du //
NG0553:849: srid gsum khyams khang gshin rje'i gnas //
NG0553:851: ma ra ya yi brda sgras 'joms //
NG0553:852: de dag gshin rje nag po yis //
NG0553:853: 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las //
NG0553:854: brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i don //
NG0553:855: 'khor gyi khro bo dregs pa dang *//
NG0553:856: lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams la gtad //
NG0553:857: dam tshig srung dang thugs brtse'o //
NG0553:858: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ngo *//
NG0553:859: 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0553:860: rgyud gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste
NG0553:861: bcu gcig pa'o // // 'jam dpal rin po che
NG0553:862: gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so // // bal po'i rgyal
NG0553:863: po b+ha su d+h+wa ra dang */
NG0553:864: bod kyi lots+tsha ba snubs ban sangs rgyas rin po ches /
